content.webTitle: Is a second living room preferable to a garage?

fields.headline: Is a second living room preferable to a garage?
fields.bodyText: Every week a Guardian Money reader submits a question, and it's up to you to help him or her out – a selection of the best answers will appear in next Saturday's paper. This week's question We live in a new-build four-bed townhouse with integral garage. We want to convert the garage into a second living room/playroom. Will it add value – or do the opposite? We have a drive big enough for one car. Will buyers be put off by the absence of a garage, or will the extra room be more, or at least equally, attractive? What do you think?
